import React, { useState } from 'react' const Item = (props) => { const [added, setAdded] = useState(false) const onClickAdd = () =>{ setAdded(!added) let id = props.id let myId = props.myId let title = props.title let description = props.description let price = props.price let img = props.img props.favoritesBtn({title, description, price, img, id, myId}) } const onDelete =()=>{ props.onDeleteFavorite(props.id) } return (

{props.title}

{props.description}

{props.price}

) } export default Item
